sources.title: Pink String And Sealing Wax
sources.description: A drunken, abusive tavern-keeper's adulterous wife uses the backward son of a rigid, puritanical pharmacist who makes his entire family miserable.

metadata.Plot: In Victorian Brighton a scheming pub landlady befriends an innocent chemist's assistant in order to get hold of poison to do away with her boozy husband.
metadata.Writer: Roland Pertwee, Diana Morgan, Robert Hamer
metadata.Actors: Mervyn Johns, Mary Merrall, Gordon Jackson
